title: CT Log Operator List
description: A list of all CT logs provided by an operator, with URLs to their individual metadata files.

$schema.description: A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to.

operator_name.description: The human-readable name of the CT Log Operator.

last_updated.description: The timestamp (ISO 8601) when this file was last updated.

friendly_name.description: A brief, human-readable name for the log.

log_id.description: The SHA-256 hash of the log's public key, base64 encoded.

metadata_url.description: The URL where the full metadata for this log can be found.
